title: Bottled Up
content_html:
Location

Media Lab, 3rd Floor, outside E15-313.

Inspiration

Where do the potions in RPGs come from? Who makes them? Humanity has spent centuries searching for an answer to this age-old question. But the search is at an end - now you can make the potions.

What it does

Bottled Up is a game that invites players to invent and explore. Players chop, smash and boil ingredients to make their own magical potions.

How we built it

We used Unity and SteamVR, as well as Blender and Maya for modeling.

3rd Party Assets and libraries

https://sketchfab.com/models/dfc462fb314a4ca2985b6ed7090d1e90 https://sketchfab.com/models/47c554254fd24ac29966e71819c2a0be https://sketchfab.com/models/1be00a3695c046c69eca1e0a0381e188 https://sketchfab.com/models/b264c4fbd0534372a278a9def943f52a https://sketchfab.com/models/747a541d6dca4c8c8df2f4ec0f37c00e https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/steamvr-plugin-32647 https://sketchfab.com/models/ea227e0235a54af48ae11142402b4323

Challenges we ran into

Couldn't get a Vive for testing the first two days.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

We worked well together and made a lot of progress despite being unable to test in VR.

What we learned

Waking up early for equipment checkout is important.

What's next for Bottled Up

More crafting recipes and potions.

## Location


Media Lab, 3rd Floor, outside E15-313.


## Inspiration


Where do the potions in RPGs come from? Who makes them? Humanity has spent centuries searching for an answer to this age-old question. But the search is at an end - now *you* can make the potions.


## What it does


Bottled Up is a game that invites players to invent and explore. Players chop, smash and boil ingredients to make their own magical potions.


## How we built it


We used Unity and SteamVR, as well as Blender and Maya for modeling.
